All of our Temp-A-Sure team members are trained heating and air conditioning specialists… and this include our top management. We know that it can be a challenge to decide which people to bring into your home to work on your furnace, air conditioner, hot water tank and/or gas line. That’s why we’ve built a reputation in the Toronto region for excellence.

Aeroseal Tech specializing in Aeroseal Technology and other ways  to improve Air Quality, Air Volume and Velocity for residential and commercial buildings. We take on jobs ranging from simple to complicated and perform all work with the utmost attention to detail and customer service. This way we are able to achieve the best results for our customers which we guarantee for 10 years!
Aeroseal Duct Sealing is a patented breakthrough technology that tackles leaks from the inside out. Aeroseal software allows the technician to accurately measure the duct leakage in residential homes and commercial buildings. The Aeroseal process puts escaping air under pressure and causes polymer particles to stick first to the edges of a leak, then to each other until the leak is closed.

The technology was developed within the Indoor Environment Program at Lawrence Berkeley National Laboratory, whose IAQ scientists tested it. The research was funded by US Environmental protection agency, US dept. of Energy, Electric Power Research Institute and California Institute of Energy and Environment.

The University of California was granted initial patents in 1996 and 1999, and Aeroseal holds an exclusive license to the technology.

profile:
After working for 10+ years for the big players in the industry, our President, Ishmael Ali, decided it was time to become an entrepreneur. 
His goal is to build a brand with a reputation of transparency and trust. 
He believes the focus of business should be the customer, the profit will simply follow. 

Heating and cooling are basic elements that allow us to make it comfortably through our everyday lives, some may call it essential. 
Without these elements, especially during harsh winters or sweltering summers, life can be unbearable. Ishmael stresses that we must not take advantage of individuals that find themselves in these circumstances but rather support them in achieving optimal comfort at a fair price.

Alistar Heating and Cooling Inc. provides all of your residential HVAC needs -- essentials that keep you comfortable regardless of the weather outdoors. 
We pride ourselves on our customer-centric approach to business. 
To us, a customer's satisfaction is equivalent to a job well done. 
When a customer entrusts us to work in their home, not only do we make it a priority to enhance their comfort through the temperature in their home, but it is equally important to ensure they are comfortable with the end-to-end service they receive. 

We proudly offer our services in Brampton, Mississauga, Caledon, Orangeville, Shelburne, Mono, Halton Hills, Milton, Oakville and Etobicoke. 

Give us a call - 416-317-8602
